</div>
				<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading" lang="en">Volunteers</h1>
				
				<div id="bodyContent" class="mw-body-content">
					<div id="siteSub">From xatwiki</div>
					<div id="contentSub"></div>
										<div id="jump-to-nav" class="mw-jump">Jump to: <a href="#column-one">navigation</a>, <a href="#searchInput">search</a></div>

					<!-- start content -->
					<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><div dir="ltr" class="rtlfix" style="position: absolute; top: 7px; margin: 0 12px">
<table cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td style="color: #f7fff0; border:1px solid #0076ff; background:#288cff; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-bottom-left-radius: 5px; padding:2px 5px 0 5px"> Shortcut:
</td>
<td class="plainlinks" style="border:2px solid #0076ff; border-left:0; border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-bottom-right-radius: 5px; padding:2px 5px 0 5px"> http:&#47;/xat.wiki/vols
</td></tr></table>
</div>
<div class="mw-pt-languages noprint" lang="en" dir="ltr"><div class="mw-pt-languages-label">Other languages:</div><div class="mw-pt-languages-list autonym"><a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/ar" title="المتطوعين (90% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">العربية</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/de" title="Freiwillige (60% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--high">Deutsch</a> • ‎<span class="mw-pt-languages-ui mw-pt-languages-selected mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">English</span> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/es" title="Voluntarios (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">español</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/et" title="Vabatahtlikud (70% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--high">eesti</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/fr" title="Bénévoles (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">français</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/it" title="Volontari (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">italiano</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/pl" title="Wolontariusze (60% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--high">polski</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/pt-br" title="Voluntários (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">português do Brasil</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/ro" title="Voluntari (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">română</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/th" title="อาสาสมัคร (80% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">ไทย</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/tl" title="Mga Volunteers (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">Tagalog</a> • ‎<a href="/wiki/index.php?title=Volunteers/tr" title="Gönüllüler (100% translated)" class="mw-pt-progress mw-pt-progress--complete">Türkçe</a></div></div>
<ul><li>They are <b>not xat staff</b>, they volunteer their time to help xat. </li>
<li>The xat Volunteers have no special indication on the chat (e.g. they <b>do not appear as xat staff</b>, they appear as any normal user).</li>
<li>The xat Volunteers <b>will not ask for your personal information</b> on other websites like Facebook or Twitter.</li>
<li>Never give your password to any volunteer or xat staff, even if you are sure they are real.</li>
<li><i><b>If you notice any user who claims he/she is a Volunteer and they are not on this page please report them to us immediately. To do so click <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.com/ticket">here</a>.</b></i></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Support_Tickets">Support Tickets</span></h2>
<ul><li><i>The following users have the power to answer tickets on <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.com/ticket">the xat  support ticket system</a>:</i>
<ul><li><i>Please <b>NOTE</b> that it is considered bad etiquette to ask a xat Volunteer to reply to your ticket. <br />Please understand that xat receives a countless amount of support tickets on a daily basis. Patience and understanding in this matter is greatly appreciated!</i></li></ul></li></ul>
<div style="position: relative; display: inline-block">
<table class="wikitable">
<tr>
<th>Name: </th>
<th> xat ID: <div class="plainlinks" style="position: absolute; top:0; right:0; margin:-2px -12px 0 0"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://util.xat.com/wiki/index.php?title=Template:List_of_ticket_volunteers&amp;action=edit"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/ZAXUM2c.png" alt="ZAXUM2c.png" /></a></div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Smiley_Makers">Smiley Makers</span></h2>
<ul><li>The following users can make smilies/kisses/pawns/hugs which may be used on xat:</li></ul>
<div style="position: relative; display: inline-block">
<table class="wikitable">

<tr>
<th>Name: </th>
<th> xat ID: <div class="plainlinks" style="position: absolute; top:0; right:0; margin:-2px -12px 0 0"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://util.xat.com/wiki/index.php?title=Template:List_of_smiley_makers&amp;action=edit"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/ZAXUM2c.png" alt="ZAXUM2c.png" /></a></div>
</th></tr>
<tr>
<td> <b>Cupim</b> <img src="http://xat.com/images/smw/flag/br.png" alt="br.png" /></td>
<td> <span class="plainlinks"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/Cupim">Cupim</a></span> (10000690)
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td> <b>Junior</b> <img src="http://xat.com/images/smw/flag/do.png" alt="do.png" /></td>
<td> <span class="plainlinks"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/Junii">Junii</a></span> (21299)
</td></tr>
<tr>
<td> <b>Mihay</b> <img src="http://xat.com/images/smw/flag/ro.png" alt="ro.png" /></td>
<td> <span class="plainlinks"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/Mihay">Mihay</a></span> (1700000)
</td></tr></table></div>
<ul><li>For suggestions <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://forum.xat.com/forum/7-suggestions">Click here</a></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="How_to_become_a_Volunteer">How to become a Volunteer</span></h2>
<ul><li>There is no step-by-step guide to becoming a Volunteer. </li>
<li>You must have the qualifications xat staff is looking for (which is up to an admin to decide). Currently it is invite only, we are not accepting applications.</li></ul>
